titles.title: A resolution to authorize the printing of a revised edition of the Senate Election Law Guidebook.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/18/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Committee on Rules and Administration to: (1) prepare a revised edition of the Senate Election Law Guidebook, Senate Document 106-14; and (2) print it as a Senate document, including 500 additional copies beyond the usual number.
